Additionally, Duke Energy Carolinas received a constructive order in December 2023 with new rates effective January 2024. In contrast, South Carolina’s new rates went into effect on April 1, 2023, after the PSCSC final order on March 8, 2023. This staggered implementation creates a more gradual impact on revenue recognition across 2023 and 2024.
